name: Stealth Helicopter Fingting
description:
SWAT Fly Car Shooting 3D is extremely difficult but you have to show your fighting skills by keeping the head of the heli down and shoot the enemies in deadly ocean. Use your ammo rockets to destroy the enemy troops and tanks and guided missile system to destroy fast jet fighters and helicopters.
Features:
- Realistic pilot control is very easy to use.
- World best 3D gunships fighters heli equipped with ammo and missiles.
- Realistic mountain environment and explosion sounds with 3D sound effect system.
- Store of thunder/gunship of all type fighter heli are available.
- Shot range and long range missiles are equipped to all helicopters war helicopter.
